name: Pharmaceutical Data Acquisition and Analysis
description: Application and development of devices for the purpose of collecting and analyzing experimental data in pharmaceutical development and manufacture.
department: The Leslie Dan Faculty of Pharmacy
prerequisites: BCH210H1, CHM247H1/CHM249H1, (MAT135H1, MAT136H1)/MAT137Y1, PHC340Y1 and enrolled as a Year 4 student in the Pharmaceutical Chemistry specialist program.
